name: Ghana ThinkTank Recorder
body:
### Download the Recorder Application for Android
Tap the links or scan the QR Codes below with a QR Code scanner. Make sure your device is set up to allow installation of apps from unknown sources.

| Recorder | Recorder (STA Problem) | Recorder (STA Solution) |
|:------------:|:------------:|:------------:|
| ![Recorder](http://api.qrserver.com/v1/create-qr-code/?color=000000&bgcolor=FFFFFF&data=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64274684/ThinkTank%20Recorder.apk&qzone=1&margin=0&size=200x200&ecc=L) | ![Recorder - STA Problem](http://api.qrserver.com/v1/create-qr-code/?color=000000&bgcolor=FFFFFF&data=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64274684/ThinkTank%20Recorder%20%28STA%20Problem%29.apk&qzone=1&margin=0&size=200x200&ecc=L) | ![Recorder - STA Solution](http://api.qrserver.com/v1/create-qr-code/?color=000000&bgcolor=FFFFFF&data=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64274684/ThinkTank%20Recorder%20%28STA%20Solution%29.apk&qzone=1&margin=0&size=200x200&ecc=L) |
| [Download](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64274684/ThinkTank%20Recorder.apk) | [Download](http://api.qrserver.com/v1/create-qr-code/?color=000000&bgcolor=FFFFFF&data=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64274684/ThinkTank%20Recorder%20%28STA%20Problem%29.apk&qzone=1&margin=0&size=200x200&ecc=L) | [Download](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64274684/ThinkTank%20Recorder%20%28STA%20Solution%29.apk) |
